name: Leo Dianbo Liu Assistant professor, National University of Singapore
research: Our research focuses on developing machine learning methods that enable AI systems to autonomously interact with the world and learn generalizable rules from experience in an efficient and creative manner to achieve automatic self-evolution.
prospective_students: Before starting CogAI4Sci team, Dianbo worked as a postdoctoral researcher with Prof. Yoshua Bengio and led the Humanitarian AI team at the Mila-Quebec AI Institute.
